entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except north 60 km/h over southern sections. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
